metadata.name: Seize the Night
metadata.description:
Seize the Night

Photographing the night sky was an escape for me. I was in a long term relationship that turned toxic and I would escape into the night with my camera gear. Being alone in the darkness liberated me from the pain of knowing my marriage was ending. The darkness allowed me to be in the moment and I could bury the past and ignore the future.

As the years passed and I was free of the pain of that time I would still Seize the Night whenever I could. On occasion, the night would reward me with an extraordinary display of aurora. 

I felt it was fitting to list an aurora timelapse as my first piece on SuperRare. A tribute to a turning point in my life and a milestone to my future as a photographer.
